member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject
member.summary: Creates a temporary Visual C++ project with MSBuild references replaced with file references.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration of the Visual C++ project file to process.
member.returns: The configuration of the Visual C++ project file to process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.Execute
member.summary: Executes the CreateTemporaryVCProject task.
member.returns: true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.OutputProjectFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the temporary project file to create.
member.returns: The name of the temporary project file to create.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.ProjectFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the Visual C++ project file to process.
member.returns: The Visual C++ project file to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.ReferenceAssemblies
member.summary: Gets or sets pre-resolved outputs of MSBuild references.
member.returns: Pre-resolved outputs of MSBuild references.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.ReferenceGuids
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of GUIDs of referenced MSBuild projects.
member.returns: An array of GUIDs of referenced MSBuild projects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CreateTemporaryVCProject.ReferenceImportLibraries
member.summary: Gets or sets pre-resolved import library (.lib) outputs of Visual C++ projects.
member.returns: Pre-resolved import library (.lib) outputs of Visual C++ projects.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput
member.summary: Determines the output files for Visual C++ project references.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration to look up for the Visual C++ project when using the Visual C++ project engine object model.
member.returns: The configuration to look up for the Visual C++ project.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.Execute
member.summary: Executes the ResolveVCProjectOutput task.
member.returns: true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.Override
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the override stylesheet that the ResolveVCProjectOutput task uses to change the directory of the Visual C++ built project.
member.returns: The path of the override stylesheet.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.ProjectReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets Visual C++ project references.
member.returns: Visual C++ project references.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.ResolvedImportLibraryPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets resolved .LIB file paths for native Visual C++ projects and preserves the original project reference attributes.
member.returns: The resolved .LIB file paths for native Visual C++ projects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.ResolvedOutputPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets resolved reference paths for managed Visual C++ projects. Preserves the original project reference attributes.
member.returns: The resolved reference paths for managed Visual C++ projects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveVCProjectOutput.SolutionFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the solution file that is used to set the solution macros for VCBuild.
member.returns: The path of the solution file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild
member.summary: Implements the VCBuild task. Use the VCBuild element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see VCBuild Task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.AddCommandLineCommands(Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension)
member.summary: Generates command line arguments that the VCBuild tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
member.param: Command line builder to add arguments to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.AdditionalLibPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets additional paths to append to the LIBPATH environment variable before executing vcbuild.exe.
member.returns: The additional paths to append to the LIBPATH environment variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.AdditionalOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets additional options you want to specify to the VCBuild tool.
member.returns: Additional options you want to specify to the VCBuild tool.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Clean
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the VCBuild task outputs only clean build outputs.
member.returns: true if the VCBuild task outputs only clean build outputs; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the configuration and platform to build with such as Debug|Win32.
member.returns: The name of the configuration and platform to build with

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.EnvironmentOverride
member.summary: Overrides the LIBPATH environment variable with and returns the new environment variables.
member.returns: Name/value pairs containing the new environment variable values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Execute
member.summary: Executes the VCBuild task.
member.returns: true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.GenerateFullPathToTool
member.summary: Returns the full file path of the VCBuild tool (vcbuild.exe).
member.returns: The full file path of the VCBuild tool (vcbuild.exe).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Override
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of a VCBuild property sheet file that overrides project file settings.
member.returns: The location of a VCBuild property sheet file that overrides project file settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Platform
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the platform to build for.
member.returns: The name of the platform to build for.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Projects
member.summary: Gets or sets the projects to build.
member.returns: The projects to build.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.Rebuild
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the task performs a clean build of outputs before performing a build.
member.returns: true if the task performs a clean build of outputs before performing a build; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.SolutionFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the full path to the solution file when building solutions, which is used to resolve solution-related Visual C++ project macros.
member.returns: The full path to the solution file when building solutions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.ToolName
member.summary: Returns the name of the VCBuild tool (vcbuild.exe).
member.returns: The name of the VCBuild tool (vcbuild.exe).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.UserEnvironment
member.summary: This property is obsolete.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.VCBuild.ValidateParameters
member.summary: Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any. Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.
member.returns: True if task execution should proceed; otherwise, false.
